General.Name: Haoxiangni Jujube Co Ltd
General.Description: Haoxiangni Health Food Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, procurement, production, and sale of healthy foods in China. It offers red dates, nuts, dried fruits, and freeze-dried products. The company was formerly known as Haoxiangni Jujube Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Haoxiangni Health Food Co.,Ltd. in September 2017. Haoxiangni Health Food Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Xinzheng, China.
General.Address: No. 199, Zhonghua North Road, Xinzheng, China, 451162
